author: arnetheduck
content: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/358 - add consensus block value to v3 - this is needed for multiplexing VC:s to fairly choose a block (ie the execution block value is mostly useless without it)

author: arnetheduck
content: genesis is (implicitly) a finalized state so it should consistently be returned by everybody, not sure why there's confusion here?

author: .paulharris
content: Some clients don't return `/finalized` pre-genesis (assuming before theres a non genesis finalized) which is why i was asking if everyone could make sure.

author: arnetheduck
content: ok - I guess we can link to https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/fork-choice.md#fork-choice which points this out, ie that the finalized checkpoint at genesis is the genesis state/block

author: .paulharris
content: it'll just make checkpointz a lot cleaner if its implemented consistently imo
